mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post(id, post_title, post_content, post_summary, post_type, post_status, post_view_count, member_id, created_date, updated_date) values (#{id}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postSummary}, #{postType}, #{postStatus}, #{postViewCount}, #{memberId}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update tbl_post set post_title = #{postTitle}, post_summary = #{postSummary}, post_content = #{postContent}, updated_date = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
